attributes.action: ABOLISH ALL PRESCRIPTION CHARGES THROUGHOUT THE UK KEEPING THIS GOVERNMENTS PLEDGE TO MAKE THE NHS FREE TO PATIENTS AT THE POINT OF DELIVERY
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This Government has repeatedly promissed the people of this country FREE treatment at the point of delivery in its manifesto and have yet to fully deliver on that promiss. Prescriptions are an essential and integral part of that treatment which is given at the point of delivery, yet this Government still charges and increases that charge year on year. The Welsh assembly have now led the way by abolishing prescription charges. This Government should immediately do the same and fullfill its promiss to the people in its own manifesto.
